title: Spammer : Fornode
content:
Get rid of this guy, he's been way too busy.  
{link edited out by moderator}
author: AndrewSipe

comments.content: Yes, the recent posts are getting hard to find. Kill it with fire.
in the future, the best way to alert someone to forum abuse is to [contact a moderator](http://web.archive.org/readme#help).

Maybe the account creation process should be... less automated?

hhp
oh, I looked for you, Yves and Miss Tiffany and I didn't see either online at the time. I don't know of any other moderators. You guys need labels.
